data.name: Portal: Revolution
data.detailed_description:
The cores of Aperture Science plot to destroy GLaDOS after being knocked out in Portal 1. As you, a test subject tasked to help, try to accomplish your mission, you make startling revelations of what implications your actions may have.

Portal: Revolution is a fan made mod for Portal 2 set in the same universe. It plays before the events of Portal 2 in the dead and decaying Aperture facility.

This mod includes:
  • 4 chapters
  • 2 new characters
  • New testing elements
  • New story
  • Brand new environments
  • Over 20 new puzzles of all difficulties
  • Original custom music
data.about_the_game:
The cores of Aperture Science plot to destroy GLaDOS after being knocked out in Portal 1. As you, a test subject tasked to help, try to accomplish your mission, you make startling revelations of what implications your actions may have.

Portal: Revolution is a fan made mod for Portal 2 set in the same universe. It plays before the events of Portal 2 in the dead and decaying Aperture facility.

This mod includes:
  • 4 chapters

data.short_description: Return to Aperture Science after GLaDOS' near death in Portal 1 to go on a mission to finish her off. At least that was the plan...
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 3.0GHz P4, Doal Core 2.0 or AMD64x2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForece 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Same requirements as Portal 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MAC OS 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo (+2GHz)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Duo Core Processor (2GHz minimum)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
